scalar Date

type Connection {
  edges: [Edge!]!
}

interface Edge {
  cursor: String!
  node: Currency! @connection(name="getCurrency")
}

union Cursor = String!

enum SortDirection {
  ASC
  DESC
}

type Currency implements Node & interface Node {
  id: ID!
  abbreviation: String!
  symbol: String!
}

query concurrentRequests($walletIDs: [ID!]!) {
  wallets(ids: $walletIDs) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

mutation concurrentMutations($walletIDs: [ID!]!, $balance: Float!) {
  updateBalance(wallets: { ids: $walletIDs, balance: $balance }) {
    id
    balance
  }
}

    country

  }

------------------Payload:-------------------

type Query {
  customers(filters: [CustomerFilter], aggregations: [Aggregation]) : CustomerAggregateResponse
}

type CustomerFilter {
  name: String!
}

type Aggregation {
  field: String!
  operation: OperationEnum!
}

enum OperationEnum {
  SUM
  AVG
}

type CustomerAggregateResponse {
  id: ID
  name: String
  ageSum: Float
  salaryAvg: Float
}

  updateCurrency(
    id: "7c661e2c-81a6-416d-b3cf-f78bce5c54c3"

    symbol: "SZDXBFOMQK"

query {
  getCity(cityID: "city_id") {
    id
    name
